title: [Large-Scale] Design and Operation of Virtual Classroom-Based Science Inquiry Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific terminology comprehension and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Science curriculum-integrated project-based learning (PBL) environment with real-time collaboration using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Students can systematically collect and analyze scientific experiment data on virtual classroom platforms
Learners design solutions to scientific inquiry problems based on literature analysis results
Participants visualize and present patterns in experimental results using data mining techniques
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
